C |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 2016/12/29 |page_start_origon = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/olimex/olimex_a10-olinuxino-lime |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;A10; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A8 (v7-A) |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ4G63MFR-PBC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8201CP; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2019.04; |stockos = Linux;4.19.5
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 10 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI 1.4, Micro SD Card slot, LiPo battery connector, GPIO, |addchip = PMIC;X-Powers Limited;AXP209;;1;,,, 16-Kbit I²C-Compatible (2-Wire) Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C16BN;;1;,,, 5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy Corp;SY6280;;3;,,, 1.2A, 1.5MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8008C;;2;,,, 2A, 1MHz Step Up Regulator;Silergy;SY7208;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = 1234 |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian, Armbian, Arch Linux (Arm), OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 12/2013 |estprice = 40 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Bulgaria
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''"A10-OLinuXino-Lime Rev.C"'' is silkscreened on the board :(below the GPIO-2 connector). {{see also|Allwinner|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' A10 (ARM Cortex-A8) @1 GHz *GPU: ''Mali-400'' *Memory: 512MB (DDR3@480MHz) SDRAM *Onboard Storage: TF card (64GB)/MMC card slot *Ports: 1x FE LAN, 3x USB 2.0, 1x SATA
==Links of Interest== *[https://linux-sunxi.org/Olimex_A10-OLinuXino-Lime ''Olimex A10-OLinuXino-Lime'' on '''Linux-SunXi'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2013/11/18/olimex-announces-30-euros-a10-olinuxino-lime-for-december/ ''Olimex Announces 30 Euros A10-OLinuXino-LIME'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/tiny-hackable-40-dollar-board-runs-android-and-linux-on-allwinner-a10/ ''Tiny hackable $40 SBC runs Linux on Allwinner A10'' on '''LinuxGizmos''' ] *[https://archlinuxarm.org/platforms/armv7/allwinner/a10-olinuxino-lime ''A10 OlinuXino Lime'' on '''archlinux|ARM''']
